consultancy_proposals.title: Social Media Intelligence & Market Analysis Platform
consultancy_proposals.problem_statement: Businesses struggle to monitor competitors, track market trends, and visualize social media performance in a unified, actionable format.
consultancy_proposals.proposed_solution: Deploy a custom social media intelligence system combining automated data scraping (social_media_scraper.py), market analysis frameworks (from client project methodology), and real-time dashboard visualization (modern_dashboard_kit).
consultancy_proposals.value_proposition: Transform scattered social signals into strategic intelligence, reducing manual monitoring by 80% and enabling data-driven marketing decisions.

consultancy_proposals.title: IntelliWealth AI Business Transformation
consultancy_proposals.problem_statement: Founders and executives struggle to operationalize AI into scalable revenue systems while maintaining governance and profitability.
consultancy_proposals.proposed_solution: Deliver a full-stack AI transformation program with executive alignment, AI ops architecture, automation playbooks, and a measurable revenue roadmap.
deliverables: AI operations architecture and workflow design
consultancy_proposals.value_proposition: Accelerate AI adoption with a structured revenue-first transformation model that compresses execution cycles and improves operational clarity.

consultancy_proposals.title: Commander API Ops Automation
consultancy_proposals.problem_statement: Teams want automation but lack a unified orchestration layer to coordinate AI agents, workflows, and revenue operations.
consultancy_proposals.proposed_solution: Deploy the Commander API stack with tailored workflows for content, commerce, and revenue ops, plus onboarding and governance support.
deliverables: Workflow templates for sales, fulfillment, and reporting
consultancy_proposals.value_proposition: Centralize automation under one command layer, reducing operational complexity and improving execution speed.

freelance_services.title: Custom Data Visualization Dashboard Service
freelance_services.service_description: Design and develop interactive dashboards that transform raw data into actionable visual insights. Includes data integration, custom visualizations, and responsive design.

freelance_services.title: Social Media Scraping & Data Collection Service
freelance_services.service_description: Automated collection of social media data for market research, competitor analysis, and content strategy. Ethical, compliant data gathering with structured output.
freelance_services.legal_notes: Ensure ToS compliance for each platform

digital_products.title: Analytics Dashboard Template Kit
digital_products.description: A comprehensive, ready-to-use Figma dashboard template kit featuring 50+ components, 10 complete dashboard layouts, and dark/light themes. Perfect for SaaS, e-commerce, and business analytics.
production_steps: Create preview images and demo video
digital_products.revenue_potential: Passive income: $500-2000/month based on marketing effort

digital_products.title: IntelliWealth Executive Training Program
digital_products.description: A structured executive training program that turns AI strategy into measurable revenue execution, including playbooks, worksheets, and implementation checklists.
production_steps: Create landing page + sales email sequence

digital_products.title: Bopper Income Platform (Beta Access)
digital_products.description: Early access to the Bopper income automation platform with templates, workflows, and guided onboarding.

digital_products.title: Python Web Scraping Starter Kit
digital_products.description: A beginner-friendly course teaching web scraping with Python, bundled with ready-to-use scraper templates for common use cases (social media, e-commerce, news).
production_steps: Outline curriculum based on DEMO-004 structure
